EmailTemplate.name: OLD 01.1 Salesforce Self-Directed Learning
EmailTemplate.subject: Start Learning Salesforce Today!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Get a head start on your Learning Journey!
Before attending Sales Onboarding, please take the Salesforce Training courses found on the Salesforce Self-Directed Learning Modules Study Guide https://na64.salesforce.com/sfc/p/700000009EOI/a/70000000bsvK/LJE.3Z.TnW9EjGjV01gHu6o0NfdbiJSEOU.uA8aq.S4.
Salesforce is a web-based customer relationship management system used internally by WEX. This Study Guide will direct you through completing the general learning modules to get started with Salesforce. The information is not specific to WEX processes but supplies a solid knowledge for additional Salesforce training.
Theses modules are tracked and will become part of your learning journey at WEX. Log into Salesforce: https://na64.salesforce.com/sfc/p/700000009EOI/a/700000005Uk9/XBhMa4.1TBCXXqaavgumyeynA7Nxvh.oCrmlmtniwcw and get started today!
Contact me or Salestraining@wexinc.com with any questions.
{!User.Name} | {!User.Phone} | {!User.MobilePhone} WEX Global Sales Training Team
